data.system_settings: Windows 10 x64, problem appears after formatting HDD and reinstalling the game.
data.expected_result: While in client, discord should show "League of Legends Client" as game that you are currently playing or at least it shouldn't make an entry
data.short_description: League of Legends client makes empty entry in games.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start League of Legends (client) - Play  one round of regular game- Progress to the Games tab
